name: Estandar Suite
description: Central hub for all Estandar Studio WordPress tools — AI, automation, and design plugins in one unified dashboard.
author: Estandar Studio Chile

sections.description: Estandar Suite unifies all Estandar Studio plugins and themes into one smart dashboard for creators who use AI, automation, and design.
sections.installation: Upload the plugin to your WordPress site or install directly from GitHub, then activate it from the Plugins page.
sections.changelog: Version 1.0.1 — initial public release with AI Copilot and GitHub auto-updater integration.
